name: Ludicrous Leap
description:
Are you up for a Ludicrous challenge with a side of adventure?

Step into a Ludicrous world where your platforming skills will be put to the test!

In this time-based platformer, you'll need to Run, Jump, Climb, Roll, and Sprint your way to victory as you navigate through several challenging levels and unique zones along your journey. Fun may quickly turn to frustration as the levels and obstacles you encounter become progressively more Ludicrous...

Advance your way through each level, then return to achieve the bronze, silver, and gold times!
